name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-ace-cardgallery
title: Adaptive Cards Sample Gallery
longDescription: This solution provides a set of eleven (11) Adaptive Card Extensions to demonstrate the various features that can be implemented roughly based on the samples provided by the Adaptive Card documentation.

references.name: Viva Connections Extensibility guidance
references.description: Adaptive Card Extensions are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page.
